welcome_desc: Ready to explore? Follow our quick guide to discover the key features.
tour_step1_desc: Use the search bar to find courses on any topic. From programming to digital marketing, knowledge is at your fingertips.
tour_step2_desc: Our AI tutor is here to answer all your questions, guide you, and help you progress in your learning journey.
tour_step3_desc: Once a course is completed, find all your certificates here. Share them on LinkedIn to showcase your new skills!
launchOffer: Launch Offer: Your first course at -50% with code FORMA50!
clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted this assignment.
noAssignmentsTodo: Well done! You are up to date with your assignments.
noAssignmentsGraded: No assignments have been graded yet.
navMyAssignments_desc: Track and submit your course assignments.
reasonTopic: Topic not relevant to the platform
rejectionTemplateQuality: Hello, thank you for your interest. Unfortunately, the quality of your presentation video does not meet our current standards. We encourage you to improve it and apply again.
rejectionTemplateTopic: Hello, thank you for your application. The topic you are proposing is not aligned with our current catalog. We invite you to check our course categories and get back to us with a new proposal.
rejectionTemplateIncomplete: Hello, your application is incomplete. Please ensure you provide all the requested information, including links to your social media and a presentation video.
rejectionTemplateGeneric: Hello, after reviewing your profile, we regret to inform you that your application has not been successful at this time. We thank you for your interest in FormaAfrique.
acceptanceTemplate: Congratulations! Your application has been accepted. You now have access to all instructor features. Welcome to the FormaAfrique team!
applicationApprovedMessage: The instructor has been approved and notified.
applicationRejectedMessage: The user's status has been updated.
aiRequestProcessed: Your request has been processed by the AI assistant.
aiRequestError: The request to the AI assistant failed.
mktExamples: E.g., 'Create a 25% discount code for Mother's Day' or 'Write an announcement for a new AI course launch'.
promoUpdateError: Could not update the code status.
moderationDescription: Approve new courses submitted by instructors.
pendingCoursesDescription: These courses will only be visible to students after your approval.
courseApprovedMessage: The course is now published and visible to all.
noPendingCoursesMessage: All clear! There are no courses to moderate.
firestoreIndexError: A database error occurred. A Firestore index is likely missing. Contact technical support.
transactionsDescription: View the history of all transactions on the platform.
transactionsSearchDescription: Search for a payment by buyer name, email, or transaction ID.
noTransactionsYet: No transactions have been recorded yet.
payoutsManagementDescription: Manage and validate payout requests from instructors.
payoutMarkedAs: The request has been marked as {{status}}.
payoutUpdateError: Could not update the request status.
noPayoutsForStatus: There are no payout requests with the status '{{status}}'.
supportDescription: Answer questions from students and instructors.
subject: Subject
manageUsersDescription: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions.
name: Name
noUsersYet: There are no registered users yet.
congrats_sent_desc: An encouragement message has been sent to {{name}}.
editRoleDescription: Changing a user's role will give them access to new features.
deleteUserConfirmationMessage: This action is irreversible. All of {{name}}'s data will be lost.
deleteCourseConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the course '{{courseTitle}}'? This action is irreversible.
assignments_description: Track and manage assignment submissions for all your courses.
create_course_for_assignments: You must first create a course to add assignments to it.
